name: Neverland Treasure
description:
Get Neverland treasure and enjoy superb match-3 puzzle with the popular characters!
Captain Hook makes a plan and Peter Pan, the boy who refuses to grow up, his friends and the island are in dangerous! Use your match-3 skills to save them!
In this new brilliant game you need to match the jewels of the same form and color on pairs and try to get the target points or other objectives. If you reach the target, than you can move further in the levels and enjoy with your friends.
Your favorite jewel matching game becomes even more exciting and challenging!
  • Master 250 addictive and challenging levels;
  • Various and original bonuses, obstacles, challenges and power-ups;
  • Excellent colorful artwork, relaxing music and vivid characters;
  • Find Neverland jewels in the great puzzle match 3 skill game!
